channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023070828
item.description:
Report X-2023070828

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-07T15:11:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-07
  • City: LANSING
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: AFTER UNLOADING THE PACKAGE OFF OF THE TRAILER THE PACKAGE HANDLER PUSHED THE PACKAGE ONTO THE ROLLERS BUT UNFORTUNATELY THE ROLLERS DIDI NOT HAVE A GUARD ON THE END OF THE ROLLERS, THIS CAUSED THE PACKAGE TO SLIP OFF AND FALL TO THE FLOOR CAUSING ONE OF THE GLASS JUGS TO BREAK DescribePack: THE WHOLE GLASS JUG WAS SHATTERED INTO PEICES DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: UNLOAD IMMEDIATELY REPLACED THE GUARD ON THE ROLLERS TO ENSURE NO OTHER PACKAGES WERE DAMAGED

item.title: Report X-2023070666
item.description:
Report X-2023070666

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-01
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was found at the start of a trailer in unload and was immediately taken by QA to the Hazmat cage. Upon inspection it was found that a dent in the lid caused the hazmat to spill. DescribePack: Dent in the edge of the metal lid cause lid to pop open slightly. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After locating the hazmat, it was put in a hazmat tote and taken to the Hazmat cage
